com.dermalog.hardware

Interface PowerManager


  • public interface PowerManager
    The PowerManager is used to switch the power of specific hardware components on or off. It knows which power types the device supports. You should query if the PowerType you want to switch on or off is supported before using it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PowerManager.PowerType

      • close

        void close()

      • power

        void power(PowerManager.PowerType t,
           boolean enable)
        Toggle specified PowerType on/off
        Parameters:
        t - PowerType to turn on/off
        enable - whether to turn power on (true) or off (false)

      • supportedPowerTypes

        List<PowerManager.PowerType> supportedPowerTypes()
        Get all supported PowerTypes on current device
        Returns:
        a list of PowerTypes you can use on this device
